name: Eco1one
0:
”Alexa,turn on Living room Light”
”Alexa, turn off Living room Light”
”Alexa, turn on home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1.Need Amazon Account Linking
2.Use eco1 app and eco1 smart home devices, app links:https://fir.im/eco1
3.Use eco1 app to configure Amazon accounts associated with eco1 app accounts.
control you devices ,you can say 
"Alexa, turn on/off device name" or
"Alexa, turn on/off light","Alexa,set light to red"
"Alexa, turn on/off switch"
"Alexa,turn on/off Thermostat","Alexa,set Thermostat to 20"

control you app scene,you can say 
"Alexa, turn on scene name"
